content: Is there any way to indicate the purpose of use in HTTP operations? For some use cases it's important for the FHIR server to know why the client is requesting certain data. For example, it is common to allow providers to "break the glass" for accessing patient data during emergency care even if that normally wouldn't be allowed.
I think this might cover your need... https://www.hl7.org/fhir/security-labels.html#break-the-glass
there are proposals to add PurposeOfUse into the SMART context. ask on the #smart stream
an alternative to SMART is a specification from IHE that profiles OAuth slightly differently - Internet User Authorization (IUA).
